data.title: Grayson College
data.meta_description: Grayson College is in the heart of Grayson County and provides a vital link for higher education. GCâs central location makes it easy for high school graduates to obtain an affordable education right here at home, or for adults to begin or continue a college-bound track and/or meet professional licensing requirements.
